name: Kids birthday party
description:
Hippo has an amazing celebration today, it is her birthday! It means that party, gifts and funny kids games are waiting for us. We are going to make a cake, learn how to paint, color pictures, play hide and seek and game find the object, learn to cook food, perform tricks and so on. Today the celebration is for everybody, for boys and girls, because the birthday will celebrate everybody in the town, not only her friend Pig! Prepare your own congratulations and gifts and visit this funny kids celebration!

Today we'll get to know how a funny family members celebrate their birthdays. Everybody has their own birthday! And everybody has their own special kids celebration. It means that unique various educational kids games for boys and girls are waiting for us. And the most pleasant moment is that our Hippo presents all these free kids educational games. Do you want to eat at the pirate ship or make a fantastic present for Daddy? Or maybe you are interested at a noisy celebration and noisy congratulations in a big company? Or maybe you like funny tricks and unexpected surprises? This game has all that! A real fun which you won't forget is waiting for you in this game.

If you like parties, presents, make cake and celebrate birthday, then visit celebration, as well as our friend Pig! Funny free mini-games are waiting for us, where we are going to learn how to paint, make up puzzles, color pictures, play the game find an object and cook food. We have prepared a lot of fun and interesting educational games for kids and all the family members!
developers: Hippo Baby Games for Girls and for Boys
